fullText: The Bard takes a back seat to the Backstreet Boys and Britney Spears in "& Juliet," a jukebox musical that is being billed as a sequel to Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet," imagining Juliet's life if she hadn't killed herself when Romeo did. The plot winds up more busy and berserk than that description, and, in any case, the show is primarily a vehicle for the hits of Max Martin.
